mechanics.trigger: While spell is active on target
mechanics.outcome: Target is immune to the Frightened condition
Target gains temporary hit points equal to Caster's Spellcasting Ability Modifier

mechanics.condition: Target has temporary hit points granted by Heroism
mechanics.outcome: Target loses any remaining temporary hit points granted by Heroism

description_text: A willing creature you touch is imbued with bravery. Until the spell ends, the creature is immune to being frightened and gains temporary hit points equal to your spellcasting ability modifier at the start of each of its turns. When the spell ends, the target loses any remaining temporary hit points from this spell.
